snippet: David Jones scored the tiebreaking goal late in the third period, and the rookie Reto Berra made 28 saves as the Flames beat the Islanders.
abstract: Calgary Flames beat New York Islanders, 4-2.
lead_paragraph: David Jones scored the tiebreaking goal late in the third period, and the rookie Reto Berra made 28 saves as the Flames beat the Islanders.

headline.main: Islanders’ Postseason Hopes Fade With 6th Loss in 7 Games
